ns2:workflow.description: Cloud Automation Services Extensibility with vRO - Take a VM snapshot after it is provisioned.

workflow-item.name: item1

bind.name: vm
bind.description: Virtual machine of which to create a snapshot

bind.name: name
bind.description: Snapshot name. The name need not be unique for this virtual machine.

bind.name: memory
bind.description: If TRUE, the snapshot includes a dump of the internal state of the virtual machine (a memory dump).

bind.name: quiesce
bind.description: If TRUE and the virtual machine is powered on when the snapshot is taken, VMware Tools are used to quiesce the file system in the virtual machine.
